mapper.select: select * from(select p.pro_no, p.pro_status, p.pro_manager, p.pro_title, p.pro_start, p.pro_end, p.pro_content, t.team_manager, tm.stf_no, rank() over (partition by p.pro_no order by t.team_id desc) as ranking from project p left join team t on p.pro_no = t.pro_no left join team_member tm on t.team_id = tm.team_id where p.pro_manager = #{stfNo} or t.team_manager = #{stfNo} or tm.stf_no = #{stfNo}) t1 where ranking = 1 and pro_status = 'N' order by t1.pro_no desc
